snippet: A legal opinion from the British government could intensify the debate over the terms under which Scotland might achieve a divorce from Britain.
abstract: Legal opinion issued by British government suggests that Scotland would have to renegotiate membership in European Union and other international organizations if it votes for independence in referendum in 2014; unusual decision to make official legal opinion public could intensify debate over terms under which Scotland might achieve divorce from rest of Britain.
lead_paragraph: A legal opinion from the British government could intensify the debate over the terms under which Scotland might achieve a divorce from Britain.

headline.seo: Scotland Faces Hurdles if It Votes to Be Independent
headline.main: Scotland Faces More Hurdles if It Approves Independence
headline.print_headline: Scotland Faces More Hurdles If It Approves Independence
